mapper.select: SELECT dc_no companyNo, dc_nm nm, dc_company_no regNo, dc_main_nm headName, dc_addr addr, dc_main_image mainImage, dc_email email, dc_pw pw, dc_tel tel, dc_introduce introduce, sessionkey, regdate, updatedate FROM dress_company

SELECT * FROM (SELECT CEIL (rownum / 10) page, dc_no companyNo, dc_nm nm, dc_company_no regNo, dc_main_nm headName, dc_addr addr, dc_main_image mainImage, dc_email email, dc_pw pw, dc_tel tel, dc_introduce introduce, sessionkey, regdate, updatedate FROM (SELECT * FROM dress_company order by dc_no desc)) WHERE page = #{page}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, dc_no companyNo, dc_nm nm, dc_company_no regNo, dc_main_nm headName, dc_addr addr, dc_main_image mainImage, dc_email email, dc_pw pw, dc_tel tel, dc_introduce introduce, sessionkey, regdate, updatedate FROM dress_company WHERE rownum <= #{page} * #{perPageNum} and dc_no > 0 order by dc_no desc ) where rn > (#{page} -1) * #{perPageNum}
SELECT count(dc_no) FROM dress_company WHERE dc_no > 0
